actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to provide for the payment of Servicemen's Group Life Insurance in the case of certain members of the Ready Reserve who died while performing service as a member of the National Guard of a State pursuant to an order of the Governor of such State.

summary.text: Provides for the payment of Servicemen's Group Life Insurance in the case of specified members of the Ready Reserve who died while performing service as a member of the National Guard of a State pursuant to an order of the Governor of such State during the period June 25, 1970 to May 24, 1974.

titles.title: A bill to provide for the payment of Servicemen's Group Life Insurance in the case of certain members of the Ready Reserve who died while performing service as a member of the National Guard of a State pursuant to an order of the Governor of such State.
